item.title: 南非大选投票在即，兰特岌岌可危
item.description: 兰特将是周三南非大选期间为数不多的交易资产之一，因为投资者的乐观情绪推动了兰特连续五周的上涨，但同时也让位于对大选意外结果风险的谨慎。【原文：The rand will be one of the few South African assets trading through the country’s general election Wednesday, as investor optimism that drove a five-week rally gives way to caution over the risk of a surprise outcome.】

item.title: 蒂努布任期已满一年，投资者希望尼日利亚提供更多服务
item.description: 博拉-蒂努布总统上任一年后，投资者对其改革的热情已经消退，一些投资者表示，如果尼日利亚稳定货币并进行更多变革，他们将重新考虑自己的仓位。【原文：One year after President Bola Tinubu came to office, investor excitement over his reforms has faded, with some saying they’ll reconsider their positions if Nigeria stabilizes its currency and enacts more change.】

item.title: 中国科技股徘徊在技术性调整边缘
item.description: 由于中国人工智能行业价格战升级以及地缘政治风险重现，恒生科技指数险些进入技术性调整。【原文：The Hang Seng Tech Index has come dangerously close to entering a technical correction as escalating price wars in China’s artificial intelligence industry and renewed geopolitical risks spook investors.】

item.title: 莫迪大获全胜有望推动印度卢比雏形初现
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）有望获得强有力的授权来执行促进增长的政策，这使得印度卢比出现了新一轮反弹。【原文：A nascent rally in the Indian rupee has room to run on expectations that Prime Minister Narendra Modi will secure a strong mandate to execute pro-growth policies.】

item.description:
无论谁在周日的选举中获胜，未来都将在很大程度上取决于 11 月边境以北发生的事情。【原文：

No matter who win’s Sunday’s election, the future will rely greatly on what happens north of the border in November.

item.title: 泰国计划发行亚洲首只与可持续发展挂钩的主权债券
item.description: 泰国计划在第四季度出售多达 11 亿美元的泰铢可持续发展债券，这将是亚洲政府首次发行此类债券。【原文：Thailand plans to sell as much as $1.1 billion of baht-denominated sustainability-linked bonds in the fourth quarter, in what looks set to be the first such offering from an Asian government.】

item.title: 尽管经济形势乐观，但欧洲首席执行官认为与中国的关系正在恶化
item.description: 大多数欧洲商界领袖表示，随着贸易挑战和地缘政治气候引发紧张局势，未来几年欧洲大陆与中国的关系可能会恶化。【原文：A majority of European business leaders said the continent’s relationship with China will likely deteriorate over the next few years as challenges with trade and the geopolitical climate drive tensions.】

item.title: 欧佩克+准备召开会议，中国石油需求前景暗淡
item.description: 在欧佩克+准备审查全球石油市场之际，该集团最大的客户正在酝酿麻烦。【原文：As OPEC+ prepares to review global oil markets, trouble is brewing in the group’s biggest customer.】

item.title: 什么又是套利交易？什么时候不赚钱？
item.description: 这里有一个提高资产收益的万无一失的方法：用更便宜的钱去买它。这就是所谓的外币套利交易的核心。投资者利用两国之间的利率差异，在利率低的地方借贷，在利率高的地方投资。当世界不同地区的中央银行奉行不同的货币政策时，套息交易尤其受欢迎，因为一个国家可能会打击通货膨胀，而另一个国家则寻求促进经济增长。【原文：Here’s what sounds like a surefire way to improve an asset’s returns: Use cheaper money to buy it. That’s the core of what’s known as a foreign-currency carry trade. Investors take advantage of a difference in interest rates between two countries to borrow where the rate is low and invest where it’s high. Carry trades are especially popular when central banks in different parts of the world pursue diverging monetary policies, as one country might fight inflation while another seeks to boost grow】

item.title: 石油资源丰富的南苏丹寻求国际货币基金组织提供 2.5 亿美元刺激经济增长
item.description: 南苏丹正在寻求国际货币基金组织提供 2.5 亿美元的资金，以帮助该国应对国际收支挑战并促进增长。【原文：South Sudan is seeking $250 million of financing from the International Monetary Fund to help the nation address balance of payment challenges and boost growth.】

item.title: 通卡说：欧盟各国政府需要在银行业规则方面更加勇敢
item.description: 德国财政部副部长表示，欧盟在银行业方面的雄心被误导了，欧盟需要重新定位，让银行更容易跨国经营。【原文：The European Union’s banking ambitions are misguided and the bloc needs a reset to make it easier for banks to operate across borders, according to a German deputy finance minister.】

item.title: 德国财政部长坚持 2025 年预算限制政策
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）不会屈服于一些内阁同事提出的在明年预算中增加资金的请求，据他的一位副手称，他将坚定地坚持执行严格的借贷规定这一目标。【原文：German Finance Minister Christian Lindner won’t yield to pleas from some of his cabinet colleagues for more money in next year’s budget and will stick firmly to his goal of enforcing strict borrowing rules, according to one of his deputies.】

item.title: 民意调查显示，瑞士人对遏制医疗成本计划的支持率正在下降
item.description: 根据 6 月 9 日投票前进行的最后一次民意调查，瑞士选民对该国医疗保健系统的拟议改革越来越持怀疑态度。【原文：Swiss voters are growing skeptical toward proposed changes to the country’s health-care system, according to the last poll ahead of a June 9 ballot.】

item.title: 欧洲央行武契奇面临不确定的未来，新任期岌岌可危
item.description: 在欧元区利率的关键时刻，克罗地亚新政府对该国央行行长的未来提出了质疑。【原文：Croatia’s new government is throwing the future of the country’s central bank chief into question at a critical juncture for euro-zone interest rates.】

item.title: 高盛推迟泰国降息至 2025 年发放现金
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）预计，泰国央行将在 2025 年上半年而不是今年下半年开始放松货币政策，因为政府为支持经济增长而增加支出的计划降低了央行降息的压力。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. expects the Bank of Thailand to start easing monetary policy in the first-half of 2025 instead of the second-half this year, as the government’s plan to spend more to support economic growth lowers pressure on the central bank to cut rates.】

item.title: 与恒大有关的调查令普华永道五月失去五家中国客户
item.description: 普华永道会计师事务所仅在 5 月份就失去了 5 家中国客户，这使过去两年中停止在中国审计业务的十多家事务所名单上又多了一家。【原文：PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP lost five Chinese clients in May alone, adding to a list of more than a dozen firms its stopped auditing in the country in the last two years.】

item.title: 中国特大城市放宽购房规定，援助范围不断扩大
item.description: 随着地方政府落实中央政府对陷入困境的房地产行业的援助，中国最大的三个城市已经为购房者推出了重大的宽松政策。【原文：Three of China’s biggest cities have rolled out major easing for homebuyers, as local authorities follow through on the central government’s aid for the embattled property sector.】

item.title: 越南通胀率创 16 个月新高，央行压力倍增
item.description: 越南的总体通胀率升至 16 个月来的最高点，这一数据可能会增加央行收紧货币政策的压力。【原文：Vietnam’s headline inflation quickened to the highest in 16 months, a reading that’s likely to add pressure on the central bank to tighten monetary policy.】

item.title: 太阳能需求拉动白银价格上涨，中国白银进口量将大幅增长
item.description: 未来几周，中国的白银进口量可能会激增，因为贸易商会利用需求的跃升，使价格远远高于国际市场。【原文：Chinese silver imports could surge in coming weeks, as traders take advantage of a jump in demand that’s taken prices well above the international market.】

item.title: 中国允许人民币贬值，人民币汇率跌至 11 月以来最低点
item.description: 中国在岸人民币跌至11月以来的最弱水平，越来越多的迹象表明，政策制定者正在放任人民币兑美元汇率下跌。【原文：China’s onshore yuan dropped to the weakest level since November as signs mount that policymakers are letting the currency decline against a resilient dollar.】

item.title: 据说亚洲水泥中国公司的所有者考虑私有化交易
item.description: 亚洲水泥中国控股公司的大股东正在考虑收购这家在香港上市的公司，知情人士透露，这家水泥生产商的股价周二飙升。【原文：Asia Cement China Holdings Corp.’s majority owner is considering buying out the Hong Kong-listed company, people with knowledge of the situation said, as shares in the cement-maker soared Tuesday.】

item.title: 日元兑欧元汇率走低，出口商收益大增
item.description: 今年到目前为止，日元对欧元的汇率已经下跌了约 9%，这为在欧洲有大量销售的日本公司带来了潜在的盈利增长。【原文：The yen has weakened about 9% against the euro so far this year providing a potential earnings boost for Japanese companies with significant sales in Europe.】

item.title: 蒙古捍卫为新主权财富基金挖掘矿业财富的计划
item.description: 蒙古总理为该国采矿法的修改进行了辩护，因为外国投资者担心这些修改可能会阻碍对该国大量重要矿产资源（包括电动汽车电池和其他新能源技术中使用的矿产资源）的投资。【原文：Mongolia’s prime minister defended changes to the country’s mining laws after foreign investors raised concerns they could deter investment in its large reserves of critical minerals, including those used in electric vehicle batteries and other new energy technologies.】

item.title: 印度股市反弹取决于莫迪能否改善 303 席的成绩
item.description: 彭博新闻社对市场参与者的调查显示，印度股市需要总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的政党在大选中赢得超过 303 个席位，才能延续创纪录的涨势。【原文：Indian stocks need Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party to win more than 303 seats in the general election to extend their record rally, according to a Bloomberg News survey of market participants.】

item.title: 联想将向沙特财富基金发行 20 亿美元可转换债券
item.description: 联想集团有限公司（Lenovo Group Ltd.）表示，计划向沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金出售价值 20 亿美元的零息可转换债券，这是几天内通过发行此类债券寻求资金的最新一家中国公司。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. said it plans to sell $2 billion worth of zero-coupon convertible bonds to Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund, the latest Chinese company to seek capital through such an issue within a matter of days.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议前地缘政治风险升温，石油涨势扩大
item.description: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）会议召开之前，中东地缘政治紧张局势加剧，红海一艘船只再次遇袭，石油涨幅扩大。【原文：Oil extended gains as another attack on a ship in the Red Sea added to heightened geopolitical tensions in the Middle East ahead of an OPEC+ meeting.】

item.title: Catalyst 量化基金做空 10 年期国债，将其作为关键的宏观押注点
item.description: 一家业绩最佳的量化基金正在做空 5 至 10 年期的美国国债，因为预计今年利率将保持在按兵不动的水平，而国债价格仍将居高不下。【原文：A top-performing quant fund is shorting five-to-10 year US Treasuries on expectations that interest rates will stay on hold this year as prices remain elevated.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。日元继续下滑。美国国债跌幅扩大。资金经理们连续第二周将资金投入中国资产。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The yen continues to slump. US Treasuries extend losses. Money managers plow money into Chinese assets for a second week. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国金融企业现金异常充裕，储蓄者纷纷涌入
item.description: 中国的金融市场现金充裕，即使是传统上流动性匮乏的企业也是财源滚滚。【原文：Cash is so abundant in China’s financial markets that even traditionally liquidity-starved firms are swimming with money.】
